      • cleanInodesFromTree

        public static void cleanInodesFromTree(java.util.List<java.lang.String> inodes,
                       int offset)
        Use to delete rows from tree containing a collection of inodes. Usually need to use this to delete tree records because of the foreign key to inode
        Parameters:
        inodes -

      • DBSearchAndReplace

        public static boolean DBSearchAndReplace(java.lang.String textToSearchFor,
                         java.lang.String textToReplaceWith)
        Will replace text in the DB within the following tables. NOTE: This is intended to replace code so we only go after columns/tables that could have HTML or Velocity code in them. Contentlet - text and text_area columns Containers - code,pre_loop and post_loop Template - body Field - field_values for the widget code Link - url
        Parameters:
        textToSearchFor - - Cannot be NULL or Empty String
        textToReplaceWith - - Cannot be NULL
        Returns:
        boolean if the method found errors. It will catch DB errors so that the replace will run everywhere it can.

      • textAssetsSearchAndReplace

        public static boolean textAssetsSearchAndReplace(java.lang.String textToSearchFor,
                                 java.lang.String textToReplaceWith)
        Will find all working/live Text in the DB and Search/Replace them. so the mimetype in db would need to be text/...
        Parameters:
        textToSearchFor -
        textToReplaceWith -
        Returns:
        boolean if there is an error found while running

      • VTLSearchAndReplace

        public static boolean VTLSearchAndReplace(java.lang.String textToSearchFor,
